Airat Bakare (amụrụ na 20 Mee 1967) bụ nwanyị Naijirịa na-agba ọsọ nke lara ezumike nká bụ onye ọkachamara na ihe omume mita 400.
Bakare mechara nke ise na 4 x 400 mita relay na 1991 World Championships, ya na ndị otu Fatima Yusuf, Mary Onyali-Omagbemi na Charity Opara.
Na ọkwa nke onye ọ bụla, Bakare ritere ọla nchara na 1991 All-Africa Games, ọla edo na 1988 African Championships na ọla nchara n'afọ 1989 African Championships.
Ọ bi ugbu a na New York City na ụmụ ya nwanyị abụọ na di ya.
